data.comment: The big names in today's match at BBVA Compass Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 1, Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
Houston's Ariel Lassiter is on target but unsuccessful.
Victor Rivas signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
Houston are caught offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Houston in Houston.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Houston, Darwin Quintero of Houston is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Ariel Lassiter of Houston smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Kevin Molino.
In the minute 11, Great play from Jan Gregus to set up the goal.
Houston to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Minnesota pushes forward through Chase Gasper, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 14, Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Minnesota's Mason Toye gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Houston defender.
Minnesota's Jan Gregus misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 15, Houston have a goal kick.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Houston.
Darwin Quintero (Houston) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
Victor Rivas awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Throw-in for Minnesota at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Minnesota.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 23, Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Houston are whistled for offside.
In the minute 25, Minnesota's Chase Gasper breaks free at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Memo Rodriguez of Houston gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
In the minute 29, Ariel Lassiter (Houston) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Can Minnesota capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Houston's half?
In the minute 32, Free kick in a good position for Minnesota!
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ariel Lassiter gets his shot on target but fails to score for Houston.
In the minute 33, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Houston to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Houston.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Houston push forward at BBVA Compass Stadium and Zarek Valentin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
In the minute 37, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In the minute 40, Victor Rivas signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Mason Toye (Minnesota) has received a first yellow card.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 42, Houston are pushing forward but Matias Vera's finish is wide of the goal.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Matias Vera for Houston has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
In the minute 45, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Minnesota's Kevin Molino gets in a shot on goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Houston have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
The first-half has come to a close in Houston.
Goal! Minnesota extend their lead to 0-2 through Robin Lod.
The second-half is underway in Houston.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Bakaye Dibassy with Jose Aja.
Houston drives forward and Darwin Quintero gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Houston needs to be cautious. Minnesota have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 49, In Houston Houston drive forward through Mauro Manotas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Houston advance rapidly upfield but Victor Rivas blows for offside.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 51, Houston have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Important block from the Minnesota defence as Maynor Figueroa fires in a strike for Houston.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Houston.
Throw-in Houston.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 55, In Houston, Minnesota push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Minnesota.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 58, Darwin Quintero puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
Victor Rivas awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Minnesota are coming forward and Emanuel Reynoso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
Throw-in for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Mason Toye with Marlon Hairston. This is the second substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
Victor Rivas signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
Minnesota's Kevin Molino is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Robin Lod for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Victor Rivas awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick Minnesota.
Kiki Struna is booked for the home team.
Can Houston capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Darwin Quintero hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Houston.
In the minute 69, Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Maynor Figueroa.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Emanuel Reynoso (Minnesota) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Free kick Minnesota.
Tab Ramos is making the team's first substitution at BBVA Compass Stadium with Niko Hansen replacing Mauro Manotas.
In the minute 77, Memo Rodriguez (Houston) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Houston Houston attack through Maynor Figueroa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Minnesota's Hassani Dotson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Houston have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a second substitution, with Nico Lemoine replacing Memo Rodriguez.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
Houston are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 81, Michael Boxall (Minnesota) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
Victor Rivas awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Houston.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aaron Schoenfeld is replacing Kevin Molino for Minnesota at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Jan Gregus (Minnesota) is red-carded and dismissed.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Houston.
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Minnesota's area.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
The match has come to a close in Houston. The final score is 2-2.
Jacori Hayes is on a sub for Emanuel Reynoso for Minnesota.
Christian Ramirez is replacing Darwin Ceren for the home team.
Houston make their third substitution with Tomas Martinez replacing Kiki Struna.
